metadata.title: CVE-2020-1699 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A path traversal flaw was found in the Ceph dashboard implemented inupstream versions v14.2.5, v14.2.6, v15.0.0 of Ceph storage and has beenfixed in versions 14.2.7 and 15.1.0. An unauthenticated attacker could usethis flaw to cause information disclosure on the host machine running theCeph dashboard.

criterions.comment: ceph: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
